name: Maze Chase
overview: MSX-BASIC game developed for Karoshi 2006 MSX-BASIC Game Contest. Your objective in the game is to escape from the mazes before your energy runs out and without being captured by the maze guardian : the deadly deep purple monster!, it will chase you in a few seconds after entering the maze!. There's no light inside it and the walls are electrified, your energy will be drained if you touch them. Seems an impossible task; but remember you can, using your chi-energy to generate a brief flash of light that could serve you to find the path to the exit. The Masters are watching you!.
